reviewComments: We were riding our motorcycles on back roads and came to this junction, good place to get off and stretch Here is a small monument commemorating the fatal crash of James Dean... read more
It is a nice memorial that was put up to remember the site of James Dean's fatal car wreck from taking a corner too fast. The corner is visible. There is various memorabilia... read more

Hearst Ranch Winery.knownFor: “ Wine Tasting with a little bit of history ” Reviewed September 26, 2016 This tasting room is a favorite of mine. Robert is very knowledgeable about the wines and the history of the Hearst Ranch. We really liked the GSM and the Malbec Helpful? Thank Jennifer1865 Report
